compounddef.title: Polygon Mesh Processing Reference
compounddef.innergroup: Named Parameters for Polygon Mesh Processing

briefdescription.para: computes a bounding box of a polygon mesh.

parameterdescription.para: a model of HalfedgeListGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
a polygon mesh
optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

entry.para: the property map with the points associated to the vertices of pmesh. If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in PolygonMesh

an instance of a geometric traits class, providing the functor Construct_bbox_3 and the function Construct_bbox_3 construct_bbox_3_object(). Construct_bbox_3 must provide BBox_3 operator()(Point_3) where Point_3 is the value type of the vertex point map.

memberdef.argsstring: (typename boost::graph_traits< PolygonMesh >::vertex_descriptor vd, const PolygonMesh &pmesh, const NamedParameters &np)
memberdef.name: vertex_bbox

briefdescription.para: computes a bounding box of a vertex of a polygon mesh.

parameterdescription.para: a model of HalfedgeGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
a descriptor of a vertex in pmesh
a polygon mesh
optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

entry.para: the property map with the points associated to the vertices of pmesh. If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in PolygonMesh

an instance of a geometric traits class, providing the functor Construct_bbox_3 and the function Construct_bbox_3 construct_bbox_3_object(). Construct_bbox_3 must provide BBox_3 operator()(Point_3) where Point_3 is the value type of the vertex point map.

memberdef.argsstring: (typename boost::graph_traits< PolygonMesh >::edge_descriptor ed, const PolygonMesh &pmesh, const NamedParameters &np)
memberdef.name: edge_bbox

briefdescription.para: computes a bounding box of an edge of a polygon mesh.

parameterdescription.para: a model of HalfedgeGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
a descriptor of an edge in pmesh
a polygon mesh
optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

entry.para: the property map with the points associated to the vertices of pmesh. If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in PolygonMesh

an instance of a geometric traits class, providing the functor Construct_bbox_3 and the function Construct_bbox_3 construct_bbox_3_object(). Construct_bbox_3 must provide BBox_3 operator()(Point_3) where Point_3 is the value type of the vertex point map.

memberdef.argsstring: (typename boost::graph_traits< PolygonMesh >::face_descriptor fd, const PolygonMesh &pmesh, const NamedParameters &np)
memberdef.name: face_bbox

briefdescription.para: computes a bounding box of a face of a polygon mesh.

parameterdescription.para: a model of HalfedgeGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
a descriptor of a face in pmesh
a polygon mesh
optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

entry.para: the property map with the points associated to the vertices of pmesh. If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in PolygonMesh

an instance of a geometric traits class, providing the functor Construct_bbox_3 and the function Construct_bbox_3 construct_bbox_3_object(). Construct_bbox_3 must provide BBox_3 operator()(Point_3) where Point_3 is the value type of the vertex point map.

xrefdescription.para: This function is deprecated since CGAL 4.10, CGAL::Polygon_mesh_processing::bbox() should be used instead.

briefdescription.para: applies a transformation to every vertex of a PolygonMesh.

parameterdescription.para: a functor that has an operator()(Point_3), with Point_3 the value_type of vertex_point_map (see below). Such a functor can be CGAL::Aff_transformation_3 for example.
a model of VertexListGraph
a sequence of Named Parameters
the transformation functor to apply to the points of mesh.
the PolygonMesh to transform.
optional sequence of Named Parameters for Polygon Mesh Processing for mesh, among the ones listed below

entry.para: the property map with the points associated to the vertices of mesh. If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in PolygonMesh

memberdef.argsstring: (const FaceRange &faces, const PolygonMesh &pmesh, HalfedgeOutputIterator out, const NamedParameters &np)
memberdef.name: border_halfedges

briefdescription.para: collects the border halfedges of a surface patch defined as a face range.

detaileddescription.para: For each returned halfedge h, opposite(h, pmesh) belongs to a face of the patch, but face(h, pmesh) does not belong to the patch.

parameterdescription.para: model of HalfedgeGraph. If PolygonMesh has an internal property map for CGAL::face_index_t and no face_index_map is given as a named parameter, then the internal one must be initialized
range of boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh>::face_descriptor, model of Range. Its iterator type is InputIterator.
model of OutputIterator holding boost::graph_traits<PolygonMesh>::halfedge_descriptor for patch border
a sequence of Named Parameters
the polygon mesh to which faces belong
the range of faces defining the patch whose border halfedges are collected
the output iterator that collects the border halfedges of the patch, seen from outside.
optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

entry.para: a property map containing the index of each face of pmesh

detaileddescription.para: Sébastien Loriot, Jane Tournois, Ilker O. Yaz This package provides a collection of methods and classes for polygon mesh processing, ranging from basic operations on simplices, to complex geometry processing algorithms.
Introduced in: CGAL 4.7 Depends on: documented for each function; CGAL and Solvers BibTeX: cgal:lty-pmp-18b License: GPL Windows Demo: Polyhedron demo Common Demo Dlls: dlls

Optional parameters of the functions of this package are implemented as Named Parameters. The page Named Parameters describes their usage and provides a list of the parameters that are used in this package.
